title: 分子级怎么禁止转换
author: 二次元狂三
txt_content: 我看别的服务器不把分子ban掉，但是可以禁止铁转换成依矿，他们是怎么弄的，求教

replies.author: FSM
replies.txt_content:

AdvancedSolarPanel_MTRecipes.cfg

config文件夹

replies.author: FSM
replies.txt_content:
配置文件AdvancedSolarPanel_MTRecipes.cfg
minecraft:iron_ingot:1; IC2:itemOreIridium:1; 9000000
删除这一条或者前面加#忽略掉
